alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula Inland; Ashtabula Lakeshore (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 19 at 1:36AM EST by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...An intense lake effect snow band will affect Ashtabula County Until 300 AM EST.... At 133 AM EST, radar indicated an intense lake effect snow band across the eastern half of Ashtabula County. HAZARDS INCLUDE... Winds to 30 mph... Visibility occasionally dropping to less than a quarter of a mile... Up to 3 inches of quick snow accumulation... Locations impacted include... Ashtabula, Conneaut, Geneva-On-The-Lake, Geneva, North Kingsville, Andover, Austinburg, Kingsville, Pierpont, Cherry Valley, Edgewood, Plymouth Center, and Kelloggsville. Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this lake effect snow band, including motorists on Interstate 90 and Route 20. Rapid changes in visibility and slick roads are likely to lead to accidents. Consider delaying travel until this snow band passes your location. &&
